revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=2Wire |model=HomePortal 1800HG |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/29/2005 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=access point,dsl modem |fcc_id=PGR2WATHG01 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5.1 |pwr_amp=2.1 |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=2Wire |cpu1_model=Medusa;3000-000171-006, eC575563-1; |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=NAND128W3A0AN6 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC8M16A2-75 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=2WIREXXX |default_ssid_regex=^2WIRE[0-9]{3}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} The default SSID is ''2WIRE'' followed by the last three digits of the serial number. :The default WEP key is printed on the unit under the serial number.
[[2Wire]] ''TriMedia'' Medusa eC575563-1 @180/200MHz (32-bit, PBGA) :The CPU ([http://happytrees.org/chips?page=manufacturer&manufacturer=2WIRE&family=TriMedia on the CPU Grave Yard]) has a TriMedia core. Device also has a ''Silicon Labs'' Si3101 and HW2000 on board.
